content.question: Which of the following statements describes the Flynn effect?

choices.label: Intelligence quotient (IQ) scores in the United States were higher in 2003 than in 1993.
Children who attend Head Start programs show short-term gains in IQ scores.
There is no statistically significant relationship between IQ scores and creativity.
People may earn higher scores when they are told the test is a personality assessment rather than an intelligence test.

content.answer: Intelligence quotient (IQ) scores in the United States were higher in 2003 than in 1993.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
